entry.title: Captain Fawcett's Hair Tonic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Fawcett's
Type: Hair Products
Price: 17.50

A refreshing blend infused with woody aromatics evoking the warm, spiced air of the West Indies. A masculine fragrance created by steeping bay leaves in rum, as did sailors of old. It has the instantly recognisable uplifting scent of traditional barbershops around the globe.

250ml/8.45fl.oz

Instructions for use: 
Take time to massage tonic with palms and fingertips, stimulating the scalp and invigorating the follicles. May be left overnight to revitalise and restore the sheen of health to tired hair. Comb for a slick style and set a confident course for the day ahead.


For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs flush with clean water.

entry.title: Captain Fawcett's Ricki Hall's Booze & Baccy Moisturiser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Fawcett's
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 42.50

For the modern dandy and man about town.

Captain Fawcett is delighted to present a luxurious bespoke moisturising cream subtly scented with Ricki Hall’s 'Booze & Baccy' Signature Series swagger. Infused with vitamin extracts & plant based nutrients to help eliminate toxins & keep complexions clear & healthy. Easily absorbed with no oily residue, the moisture retaining ingredients leave skin smooth as silk. Goes handsomely with all 'Booze & Baccy' essentials. The scent of a man who makes his mark.

Moisturising twice a day supports the skin’s natural barrier and does wonders to ward off fine lines, wrinkles and dullness, thereby keeping a fellow’s handsome visage in top-notch condition.

Grab a small amount - don’t overdo it - take it easy. Stroke into face & neck in the morning & at night, then go about your business. Suitable for all skin types. Bosh!

entry.title: Captain Fawcett's Expedition Reserve Moisturiser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Fawcett's
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 40.00

For the gentleman who appreciates the finest of pleasures.

Captain Fawcett’s 'Expedition Reserve' Moisturiser is an elegant salve, richly formulated with a fresh subtle scent to leave skin feeling silky smooth. Infused with vitamin extracts & plant based nutrients to help eliminate toxins, keeping a chap’s complexion clear & in tip top health. Perfect for layering with companion 'Expedition Reserve' essentials in readiness for adventure.

Whether manning the research stations of Antarctica or sitting through yet another ruddy Zoom in one’s parlour, a decent hydrating cream deflects environmental irritants. And what’s more, it’s never too late to start chaps!

For superb hydration, dispense a small dab of this most efficacious cream & smooth into face & neck each morning and/or at night. Allow to be fully absorbed as a little goes a splendidly long way. Suitable for all skin types. Tally ho!

entry.title: Captain Fawcett's Sea Salt Hair Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Fawcett's
Type: Hair Products
Price: 17.50

Captain Fawcett’s Sea Salt Spray lifts landlocked follicles like a flurry of wild wind. Plant extracts and sea minerals condition and nourish while rich emollients fix moisture, adding natural texture with a matte finish. Created with salt from one of the world’s oldest suppliers with an exhilarating coastal fragrance for gentlemen adventurers, men of the road, pirates, navigators, sailors, surfers, buccaneers, beachcombers, wily rovers and mermen from Margate to Madagascar.

250ml/8.45fl.oz

Instructions for use:
Use on damp hair, work in by hand or comb through and leave to dry naturally as one might at the beach. Thicker hair may well require a little more, finer hair a little less so experiment as you wish. Excellent for longer and mid-length hair and to add ruffled texture to short styles. For increased volume, spray may be applied directly to roots - start sparingly and add as required.

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs flush with clean water.

entry.title: Captain Fawcett's Maharajah Beard Oil 50ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Captain Fawcett's
Type: Beard Care
Price: 40.00

Captain Fawcett’s collaboration with The Jodhpur Company has resulted in a most outstanding new Signature Series: Maharajah! 

Redolent of balmy air perfumed by aromatic smoke and a crush of bright petals conjuring the heat of enchanted Indian nights, the Captain’s master blender has woven heady rose with peppery spice, rich musk, cedar & leather studded with dazzling citrus top notes; a majestic evocation of ancient power refined into a most elegant fragrance that entirely befits the modern gentleman.

All Hail the Hirsute

Instructions: Dispense a few drops into the palm of your hand & rub together. Smooth the oil thoroughly into your beard & gently comb through for a royal finish.

50ml ℮ 1.7 fl.oz

entry.title: Dapper Dan Matt Creme
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dapper Dan
Type: Pomade & Hair Products
Price: 12.50

Dapper Dan Matte Crème is a light hold styling cream that offers all-day long matte texture and hold.

Combining a clean and convenient airless pump dispenser with a non-sticky application, this styling product will enhance your morning style routine whilst you enjoy the fresh and masculine fragrance.

entry.title: OSMA HAEMOSTATIC PENCIL 12 gr (Pack of 6)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Osma
Type: Alums & Styptics
Price: 21.00

Hemostatic Pencil OSMA laboratoires 12gr

Osma laboratoires is the owner of CE 0459 for the production of hemostatic pencils. This CE mark is tangible proof of the quality and assurance of compliance with European legislation regarding the production of hemostatic products.

Apply the pen directly on the micro abrasions to reduce and then stop bleeding completely. Ideal for all shaving situations.
Our engagement

OSMA LABORATOIRES
Osma Laboratoires is one of the leading players in French men's cosmetics from 1957.
The recent explosion of male interest in cosmetics is not a simple fashion, but a return to the past of when the man loved to take care of himself he loved to go to the barber he loved shaving, fragrances and perfumes, he loved being part of the be a true Gentleman. Today, we are returning to what we were.

The teachings transmitted from father to son are the link that has allowed Osma Laboratoires to be loved, today by 2 generations of families and thanks to the enhancement of their knowledge in the field of shaving and constant improvement, Osma laboratories, will be increasingly loved and known by those who decide to place their trust in this company.

Osma laboratoires is the last remaining alum stone producer in France, but it is also the only one to create and renew products dedicated to male shaving, thanks to an ancestral knowledge of the processing of the raw material and the search for natural ingredients for the composition of its products

Old fashioned shave ... for today's man.

 

Pack of 6.

entry.title: Vie-Long Mint Eucalyptus Beard Oil 30mls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vie-Long
Type: Beard Oils
Price: 8.50

Good grooming is key to maintaining a healthy beard. Vielong ensures your grooming is always up to par with is nourishing Beard Oil. Designed to bring dull hair back to life and to strengthen brittle strands, the oil is crafted with powerful hydrating and moisturizing ingredients ranging from vitamin E to avocado oil to rosemary extract. Topped off with a cool aroma of mint eucalyptus, it provides your beard and skin with much needed rejuvenation.

  • Contains almond oil
  • Mint eucalyptus scent

Established in 1940, Vie-Long started as a family business in Valencia, Spain, known for their premium hand-crafted brushes. Over the years, they have steadily built a strong reputation with men across the globe, offering first-rate grooming implements to wet-shavers all over.

3.4 oz. (100 ml)
Made in Spain

entry.title: Caswell Massey Dr. Hunter's Lip Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Men's Skincare
Price: 9.00

The bar has been raised: experience the new all-natural formulation of our timeless Lip Salve.

Heal the driest lips with this deeply nourishing, soothing salve. When used regularly, the rich blend of powerful natural ingredients will quickly repair chapped, cracked, and flaky lips.

Part of the Dr. Hunter collection named for the founder of Caswell-Massey, this formula relies on the same sort of time-tested botanical extracts he would have used in 1752.


SKIN BENEFITS

  • Lanolin helps lock in moisture
  • Castor oil is moisturizing and antimicrobial
  • Rice bran wax rejuvenates and prevents inflammation
  • Sweet almond oil is deeply hydrating
  • Comfrey extract is healing and soothing
  • Sunflower seed oil protects the skin barrier
  • Safflower seed oil delivers nutrients and fatty acids into skin
  • Olive fruit oil combats dry skin with essential fatty acids
  • Aloe vera extract soothes irritation
  • Rosemary extract protects skin from free radical damage
  • Calendula extract is healing and nourishing

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 0.55 oz (16 g) tin
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Dr. Hunter's Hair Wash 240ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Shampoos & Conditioners
Price: 15.00

Shampoo gently yet thoroughly with our time-tested blend of natural ingredients that keep hair healthy, strong, and shiny. Glycerin and sweet almond oil condition hair while extracts of rosemary, parsley, and ginseng stimulate the scalp. The sulfate-free formula is mild and non-drying, with a luxurious lather and clean scent.

Part of the Dr. Hunter collection named for the founder of Caswell-Massey, this formula relies on the same sort of traditional botanical extracts he would have used in 1752.

BENEFITS

  • Glycerin and sweet almond oil condition hair and hydrate scalp
  • Rosemary stimulates scalp circulation and increases hair’s shine
  • Parsley contains an antioxidant that is known to prevent hair loss
  • Ginseng has been shown to restore hair’s natural growth cycle

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 8 oz (240ml)
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free 
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Dr. Hunter's Original Body Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Men's Bodycare
Price: 15.00

We may be famous for our scents, but we know that sensitive skin often prefers a simpler formula. This crystal clear, fragrance-free wash has a gentle, luxurious lather that is exceptionally kind to skin. Our traditional recipe includes time-tested botanical ingredients that soothe, moisturize, and heal. These are the sort of natural extracts that Dr. William Hunter, the founder of our company and the inspiration for this collection, would have used in 1752.


SKIN BENEFITS

  • Comfrey extract is healing and soothing
  • Yarrow extract is nourishing and restorative
  • Calendula extract is healing and nourishing
  • Nettle extract is an anti-inflammatory
  • Cornflower extract calms sensitive skin
  • Chamomile extract is an anti-inflammatory
  • Soapwort extract is a natural soap used since ancient times
  • Aloe vera extract soothes irritation

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • 8 oz (240 ml) bottle
  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
  • Cruelty-free
  • Made in the USA

entry.title: Caswell Massey Dr. Hunter's Foot Creme Minis
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caswell Massey
Type: Men's Skincare
Price: 4.00

Pamper tired, dehydrated feet with this replenishing plant-based cream that eradicates dryness and flaking and helps prevent cracked heels. Part of the Dr. Hunter collection named for the founder of Caswell-Massey, this formula relies on the same sort of time-tested natural extracts he would have used in 1752.

The quickly absorbing cream moisturizes and soothes with shea butter and cools with spearmint and tea tree oils. Treat feet to a quick self-massage each time you bathe or after a long day and discover the full-body relaxation that results from indulging your soles.

HOW TO ENJOY

  • Massage into clean feet, paying special attention to heels and other dry areas.
  • For even deeper moisturizing, apply before bed, put on socks, and wake up to softer feet.

SKIN BENEFITS

  • Shea butter moisturizes and reduces inflammation
  • Spearmint leaf oil cools and refreshes
  • Tea tree oil the natural antibacterial and antifungal properties
  • Lavender extract extract has stress-reducing qualities
  • Rosemary extract may help protect skin from free radical damage
  • Lemon balm extract imparts a smooth appearance

PRODUCT DETAILS

  • No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates 
  • Cruelty-free 
  • Made in the USA
